website_summaries.verdict: The most affordable of the current game systems, the Nintendo GameCube offers great graphics and good performance but few extras.
cons: No DVD or audio CD support

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt come with everything listed in the features and details
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from GG Gaming, and it did not come with the power cable, AV cable, or the contoller. I’ll quote the features & details section: “Includes Console, Power Cable, AV Cable, and Indigo Controller for Nintendo GameCube.” Im very dissatisfied with the dishonesty from a seller that’s an amazon prime certified seller. I’d comment on the quality of the product, but since I can’t turn it on to test it, I’ll just have to wait
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: The greatest feeling in the world is when you get the ...
customer_reviews.text: The greatest feeling in the world is when you get the system you’ve been wanting for months, and it gets delivered sooner than expected. What’s not so great is when you put in your favorite games and it doesn’t even read any of them. Nothing better than a gaming console that can’t play games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't disappointed at all!
customer_reviews.text: Here's a story you wouldn't care about. I got a free Player's Choice Luigi's Mansion, and I needed a GameCube for it. I first went to eBay, but I couldn't take chances. I bought the whole set here for only $60-, and I gotta say, it's good for its price. Really clean and reads discs flawlessly. Amazing for its price; you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Orduna

customer_reviews.title: It works, it plays, its been over a decade...
customer_reviews.text: The system works. That is most important here. For the price, I would say I am satisfied. Pros: Cube is in decent aesthetic shape. A few scratches, but nothing major. Memory cards and all games seem to work. Cons: Only one, but a major one. Only the third-party controler works. I tried an old wave-bird, 2 gamecube controllers, and even the Wii U Smash Bros. controllers. None work. The third party controller included is dimensionally similar, but the buttons feel different than they are supposed to. Ultimately, the system as purchased satisfies most of the nostalgic itch it was purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: Shane M.

customer_reviews.title: Scratches are acceptable, corrosion is not
customer_reviews.text: Upon unboxing, while the console itself has scratches and pieces chipped off, it was still acceptable. However, upon look though the air vents, there was corrosion underneath the disc tray. I didn't even test it to make sure it worked because it's only a matter of time before that corrosion goes into the motherboard and starts destroying the components of it. Corrosion is one of those things you have to look for when getting any piece of technology.
customer_reviews.author: jstep32x

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loving it!
customer_reviews.text: The box was a bit beat up but hey that's not really the seller's fault (at least I doubt it). It actually came in like, WAY earlier than expected. WONDERFUL. Just a few hardly-noticeable scratches, which were already mentioned so its cool. Plays all my games perfectly fine. Mine came with the necessary cords, so bonus. Also came with a third party controller (madcat) that was very comfy, and in seemingly new condition to be honest. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Super Smash Bros. Melee time
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this so that he could play Super Smash Bros. Melee. He and his friends love to play it. He takes this to school and to his friends house so that they can have battles. He and his brothers kept a lot of their Gamecube games so now they are reliving memories that they had a decade ago. Came in great condition and in a timely manner. My son is very happy with this purchase,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross Dust Debris and Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Came in good at first, until it started not being able to read any discs until I had to open the lid and close endlessly for it to work for only three minutes or less. Discovered that the fan on the side was coated in probably the most disgusting dust debris I have ever seen in a console and had to clean as best I could with Q-tips. Waited all day for this console and was heavily, heavily disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted
customer_reviews.text: This came busted up with dead roaches in it and missing pieces. The end of the controller cord that connects to the console was rusted. *edit* Apparently even though the price of the product was $50 I was only refunded less than $33. DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS COMPANY!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsWhite

customer_reviews.title: Item dosen't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a game cube that had a lens that didn't function properly. They won't give me my money back or a non-damaged product in return so do not buy anything off of this buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I did so
customer_reviews.text: I bought one on an impulse even though I have a Wii so I technically don't need a Gamecube to play Gamecube games. All things considered, I'm so happy I did so. A game console that's a cube. Revolutionary. I don't know. There's just something about my game system having a handle on the back that makes me think, "This hunk of plastic is stupid cool." The console I received came in the condition described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love My GameCube
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this GameCube a while Back I have been looking for this system for a while now I finally found it and I'm very satisfied. i'm just now writing my review it came in mint condition overall I'm very satisfied with my purchase five stars from me
customer_reviews.author: james ruffin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. "Very good condition" came all scratched up and not one game worked. But says works great
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Gamecube is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: When my GameCube arrived and I opened it, I was surprised! I saw the GameCube console, a controller, power cords, AV cords and even a memory card. I expected there to be no cords or a memory card. The console has some scratches and it has some chips but it works perfectly! The controller is excellent and again it does have some scratches and chips and it’s also a non official Nintendo controller but that doesn’t bother me that much. The cords work perfectly and the memory card works. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DatSwagMario_YT

customer_reviews.title: If its Japanese, then mark it as a Japanese system.  Arrived quickly tho
customer_reviews.text: It said nothing about being a Japanese GC. Besides it being Japanese, it still turned on well so there's that. Just doesnt do well in the USA. Be careful out there.
customer_reviews.author: Steven !

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new GameCube and I never owned a different color of one cause I had this purple gamecube since I was in 7th grade. I love classic gaming consoles and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon McCullen

customer_reviews.title: Very misleading description
customer_reviews.text: The description says it comes with all wires and a controller. We received only the console today. If we would have known that we would not have purchased this item. I dont even know if it works as we now have to order all wires separate. Very misleading!
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: The gamecube came all busted up! There is a ...
customer_reviews.text: The gamecube came all busted up! There is a huge crack in the frame in the back bybthe handle. And a large chip in the front. Something is raddleing around inside and when i turned it on its making a constant noise. Not worth the price i paid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross sticky, slow delivery
customer_reviews.text: It came all sticky and gross, and there is a part rattling around, didn't come with cables, so I have to wait for that to go in, after waiting two weeks for this to come in. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mstine

customer_reviews.title: Third time is not a charm with reading discs.
customer_reviews.text: Console kind of works but takes three times with any disc to actually read. Shipping was faster than anticipated so that is nice but the overall quality isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: The console didn't work, right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty simple, when you order a console (even a used console) you expect it to at the very least work. It was chipped up and scuffed up all around, but that would have alright if it had played any games. The lid latch was finicky and rarely allowed the console to close, and even when it did, the console's disc reader didnt spin, and subsequintly didnt read any of the discs I tried. Had to immediately return it, incredible waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Well... Thanks
customer_reviews.text: An enormous amount of scratches, But other then that everything works! Came with 1 controller.. Thank GOD I remembered to purchase a memory card! Some games don't work without a memory card. The game came quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Simone Baby

customer_reviews.title: Big issue on a great console
customer_reviews.text: I thought it worked great until it randomly shut off, which constantly happens, could shut off after 5 minutes or 3 hours. Unfortunately now this is a reoccuring problem, which sucks for playing literally anything. Also doesnt come with a memory card which is pretty dumb in my opinion. All that being said, when it does stay on it runs smooth and i am overjoyed to be able to play my childhood games and reach nostalgic nirvana.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin F

customer_reviews.title: Great game system
customer_reviews.text: A great game console for family fun. It was very easy to install without even opening up the owner manuals. The wireless controls we bought worked up to 30 feet away. The game selection is very good, so whatever games you like there is something for you. The console is very durable so it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Weylin Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was inspecting one it was black no ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was inspecting one it was black no controllers and no wires and no memory card not impressed and cube was scratched up and the reset button is mashed in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Was packaged really nicely, full of bubblewrap. Also came with a controller, which was a pleasant surprise. Looks great, minimal scratches. Cords were wrapped nicely. Only bummer- some discs that work on other GameCubes don't work on this console. I have only had the console a day, so I haven't investigated much yet. Hopefully it just needs to be cleaned or something. Came in great time, was packaged with care, and overall I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was an amazing deal and everything was in working order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this video game system. I haven't had a problem with it every since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Yung Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Worked out in the end
customer_reviews.text: Was a little dusty and didnt come with much like cables or a memory card but it works great if you have spares from previous gamecubes like I did then its not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not “very good”
customer_reviews.text: Product was full of scratches and scuffs. It’s missing one of the bottom coverings and start / load screen for the console skips. Very disappointed. Could have found a better product from shopping around locally in pawn shops and yard sales. Would not recommend. 👎🏾
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dray Johnson

customer_reviews.text: Didnt work i had moved when i bought it n it got lost anyway
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: My son requested a GameCube for his 12th birthday. After his party we went home and set it up. It worked flawlessly. He was so excited. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TammiGayle

customer_reviews.title: good price and came on time! works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: got mine from sosagames and it came and works just fine :) cords were not the original but they still work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cobalt Wolf

customer_reviews.title: i was pleased with the appearance of the cube
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had was when I first got it it wouldn't read discs because the little part that holds the eye keeps moving. But, I think its an issue with a lot of GameCube, because my silver one does it too, just not as often. Otherwise, i was pleased with the appearance of the cube, it was in great condition. Shipped fast and priced decently well. I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What you read is not always what you get don't buy without a guarantee
customer_reviews.text: Game console was missing screws pried on with a screwdriver didn't even sit evenly on a flat surface. But worse off once set up it would not even read a disc shipping was slow ordered 11/24/2019 recieved 12/2/2019 and this was supposed to be 2 day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Mahnesmith

customer_reviews.title: And it wasnt even wiped down lol looked like it was litterally taken off a shelf and shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: Didnt come with TV adapter. And it wasnt even wiped down lol looked like it was litterally taken off a shelf and shipped in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Childhood
customer_reviews.text: The game console works beautifully I almost started crying because it bought back soo many memories as a teenager when nothing mattered. I got the bundle so everything was there to start playing right away which is awesome! Will purchase games and other thing from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: GameCube, a great console.
customer_reviews.text: Seeing as it just turned 2015, I know I am definitely late for the reviewing of the GameCube. But let me just say that this is the best console I have ever played. I recently just bought a used one and just got it earlier today and it still blows my mind how much I love this thing! The controller, its portability, exclusive games... these are things that make this console such a great classic and so hard to forget. For that, thank you Nintendo. Your work, it doesn't get much better than this,
customer_reviews.author: Jakob F.

customer_reviews.title: Still Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas along with Wind Waker and Metroid Prime, probably with Melee to come in the future. He'd sold his and regretted it ever since, so he was very pleased. It's amusing to read old reviews talking about the Gamecube as though it were new (which, of course, it was), but even now the Gamecube has some incredibly nostalgic and exciting titles with which you should think to rekindle your relationship if you need something to play besides the recent fare.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Very Portable
customer_reviews.text: Really like the portability of this console. Its easy to transport it and play at someone's house.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Great console, great games, good graphics! And all around fantastic classic gaming system.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: So I just got my gamecube, the indigo one, and it seems like its in great condition! The only thing I noticed is there's a chipped piece at the bottom which isn't important, the wires work great and everything! I just have to wait for my controller to come in cause it didn't come with one, not complaining though!
customer_reviews.author: Littleton Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Except for some minor cosmetic nicks it runs perfect. Came with all the needed cords to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Except for some minor cosmetic nicks it runs perfect.Came with all the needed cords to play as soon as you get it open!
customer_reviews.author: Damon Cold

customer_reviews.title: Try a different seller
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with controller, power cable or A/V cables as promised. Very disappointing to open a box to a GameCube I cannot use. I’ve already paid close to $100 with expedited shipping. Am I expected to pay for the separate cables now.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Isaac Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Filthy
customer_reviews.text: It was sticky, dusty and dirty when it arrived. No cords came with it. It was totally different than listed, filthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good deal but...
customer_reviews.text: good deal system and the controller worked great and in great condition was rebuild of course, but it even had all the bottom covers which normally get misplaced. The only disappointment was the description stated it would come with a random free game, but it did not and never received a reply back from the seller, but it all good the system was the main thing game would have been a plus tho. would still buy again and recommend cant beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cr4$h0v3r1d3

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Its in all black and white and the sound was barely hearable. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: matthew rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Game Cube was guaranteed to work, but did not work. Tried with multiple games that worked on a different game cube so we know this game cube is not reading the discs.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Prater

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: It was in great condition, arrived early and worked properly. Win win win.
customer_reviews.author: Airin Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement system once ours died
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement system once ours died. Got a lot of use out of it and wound up giving it to someone else once my son outgrew it.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Alosi

customer_reviews.title: The item description says it comes with a controller, ...
customer_reviews.text: The item description says it comes with a controller, av cables, and power cables. It only came with the cube. Now I have to spend more money and wait longer to actually see if it even works.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, wonderful condition, delivered much faster than expected. Top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Herbig

customer_reviews.title: Great time in memory lane
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday - she told me she remembered playing a certain game on the gamecube and she really missed it &wished she could play it again. I was nervous ordering this used because I was afraid it wouldn't work. It works great & she loves it- she was so surprised to get one because she thought they were gone! Having a fun time playing old games again!
customer_reviews.author: LuvToShopAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t read discs well/shuts down in the middle of the game
customer_reviews.text: This game cube has not worked since we got it in December. We thought it was maybe the two games we got but it’s been every single disc we try to play. It stops playing every single game. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenica Devening

customer_reviews.title: Gaming
customer_reviews.text: My sons are into gaming. They play all kinds of games. This system allows them to play games that are oldrr but still relevent to their style. The can play older Mario and Sonic games which are popular for their age. The graphics are pretty good for an older system. The games are easy enough for younger users and some are more challenging for older users. Good system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one I was promised said that it was fully ...
customer_reviews.text: The one I was promised said that it was fully functioning. However mine was not and I bought it from LvlUpGaming. The first player controller port is finicky requiring you to wiggle the cable until the system realizes it is there. Also it doesn't keep the time and date even with a memory card. But, it does play games flawlessly and I really can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.text: Showed up with missing parts. Controller damaged. Look like it got chewed by a dog
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Gamecube is still one of the best family consoles
customer_reviews.text: I had a gamecube 10 years ago but sold it... BIG MISTAKE because now I wanted to reminisce my childhood so I got my self another one from a great seller who sent me a good system, sure it has a little ware but it works like a charm, now I can play all my gamecube favorites!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Perez

customer_reviews.title: Only one complaint.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner. Only complaint is the GameCube was dirty. Had what appeared to be some type of sticker residue and dirty spots on top. That's the only reason I am giving 4 stars. Overall the product worked and came with a memory card, wires, and a controller.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Works great but
customer_reviews.text: The system works great but the the c stick on the controller is wanting to slowly go up
customer_reviews.author: chef7022

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: speedy delivery; great condition; exactly as described. We have enjoyed hours and hours already and not a single problem. Would recommend seller to everyone and will buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with our GameCube! Came earlier than expected and we found it to be in great conditions! Bought it with the original Luigis Mansion game. Came in great conditions with all of the plugs/cords.
customer_reviews.author: Meliveshka

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: 1-The lens is very sensitive which need almost non scratched DVD to work it out . I have same DVD which is working with other consoles, whereas it is not working with received console. 2- as mentioned in the specification, it was mentioned as very good condition. However, it was found with lot of scraches and dirty which should be categorized as acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing
customer_reviews.text: Loved it works perfectly fine I would recommend it to EVERYONE.
customer_reviews.author: Jajja2016

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The AV cable I received with this product does not work well... I will have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Product was packaged well and works like a charm! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Retro Gaming Extraordanaire!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Gamecube, if you're into Retro gaming at all it's a great console to play all the great Gamecube hits with. Whether it be F-Zero GX, The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker, Star Wars: Bounty Hunter. Pikmin... etc... the list goes on. Highly recommend this console to retro gamers, has a wide variety of games, each unique with their own fun to them.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody Important

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and the game system is like new. My son is very happy with it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Go Go Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works, but could've been cleaned
customer_reviews.text: It works and came in good condition with slight wear and tear, but it was dirty, and a door was missing from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: LaSonia N.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I saw the Amazon box in my front porch. Only to be dissapointed when I opened it and installed it. The GameCube was in Japanese which was not discribed to me when I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Luis raya

customer_reviews.title: Used good buy
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected only a couple scratches on the top and the open botton is a little weird on it also other than that works great! The controller av and power cord seemed new the free game that game with it was in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Joey rago

customer_reviews.title: GameCube, greatest little device ever! LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!! Such a classic! Portable, durable, simple n FUN!!
customer_reviews.author: Mac Daddy

customer_reviews.title: the spring is no good. Can't play a game if the lid just ...
customer_reviews.text: Game cube top doesn't close, the spring is no good. Can't play a game if the lid just pops back open
customer_reviews.author: BritneyTheButterfly

customer_reviews.title: Easy fix
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work when I ordered it, so I had to order the drill bit and open it up to fix it. It was an easy fix, but still it was inconvienient. Other than that it was great
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Ellingsworth

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 0 stars I would
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. It randomly shuts off in the middle of the game. Not all controller adapters work. Overal trash. Very disappointed in this product and seller for selling this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: The description said that there was a little wear and tear on the device. I would considered using the word "little" to be an overstatement, the device looked almost brand new! The GameCube runs like a charm and I'm so happy I finally have one
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Amazon page said it can with Power cable, AV ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon page said it can with Power cable, AV cable, and controller, but when the package arrived it only held the console. Now I have to go out and purchase these things and won't be able to play the GameCube for at least another day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product did not include the cables. The description said that it did.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Koster

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't have been in the used-very good category
customer_reviews.text: Game cube works, but has lots of deep knicks, cane filthy dirty, with sticky stuff in spots all over it! And didn't even come w a power cord!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo's Perfect Game Console
customer_reviews.text: It has been a while since I bought video games. I decided to buy the Gamecube because I only had the Wii Family Edition, which can't play Gamecube games and accessories. The console has excellent graphics even in AV cords. The Gamecube has a great cube design, and it looks good itself. Overall the Gamecube deserves 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Will H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks fine. can't even test it yet though because there were no cords included.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Everything looks great... Except for controller.
customer_reviews.text: The Gamecube itself is in great condition, just need to try it and make sure it works-- Cables all look good, no breaks or frays-- The controller that came with it, though was filthy, and I ended up throwing it away (we already had old controllers from our previous system, so it was no real loss). Everything else is fine, but the controller was.... Eugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't come with what they say
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with cords or controllers as it said
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY from Pawnline
customer_reviews.text: GAMECUBE turns on but does not read any disc's even New ones extremely unsatisfied waste of time and money !! Regret buying it . I waited almost two weeks for something that does not work
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: GameCube lives on! 👍🏼😂🎉🎮
customer_reviews.text: Product took about a week to arrive. Was in conditioned described on Amazon. I tested it and works well. Now I can once again enjoy playing my GameCube classics! Mahalo🌈
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Murashima

customer_reviews.title: Under wrong category
customer_reviews.text: Labeled as a video game. Anyways, this console is a classic from my childhood that I just had to use again. It is a powerhouse with very fun games to play on it. You can leave it on for a long time without a heat issue which is rare for modern consoles. The included controller has a short cable but other than that this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chad J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly & no damage, when received. Product is satisfactory & same as advertised. I would definately do business with them, again. I would buy the product agin, as long as it was this same seller & I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny-Be-Good

customer_reviews.title: I love the game system but I ordered this used and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the game system but I ordered this used and it had dirt and dust We cleaned it. I hope this will last for a while. But the game system it self is a classic to have.
customer_reviews.author: gratefull

customer_reviews.title: Seller was very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: GameCube works great! It's the seller I'm not pleased with. He specifically said power cord would come with console, but sadly it did not. The GameCube was covered and dust and he did not seem to even try and make it lol pleasant. All I wanted was to pull it out of the box and play, but unfortunately, I need to spend more money than I anticipated just because the seller cannot keep to his word.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for nasty products and deceiving descriptions
customer_reviews.text: Extremely dirty & had to return and had no cords, memory cards or controllers
customer_reviews.author: Dylan W

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: The GameCube works fine and it came with a power cord. If you plan on buying one make sure to get the audio/video cable and a memory card to go with it. The GameCube does look like it has been used a lot but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: William Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Digital AV Out Plug Missing
customer_reviews.text: I can’t play the console because I don’t have a wire for a plug that says Digital AV Out. Is it possible to play on the Console without plugging that in?
customer_reviews.author: Zaire Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! So fast and works wonderfully. Came with everything expected ^^
customer_reviews.author: Alice Saito

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't read any discs. Tried four different games and it never read a single one. Wish I could leave zero stars because it didn't work at any point in time.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: this game cube was in great condition it did have a little bit of scratches on the top but that's what you should expect from a used game cube. It didn't come with the av cord or the power cord but that's OK i bought some for 8 bucks. Over all this is a great Game cube I am happy with it and remember if your going to buy a game cube make sure you have a memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Gun Nut

customer_reviews.title: Controller Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: The controller didn't even work one time. This was a Christmas gift that my son was unable to use because the controller didn't work. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colby Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Works, nice, good condition
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. We bought some cables to connect to TV and it powered up and works. Very nice. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: firewallbillTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a GameCube when I was younger but I sold it because I thought I was getting too old for it. Now, years later, left will a bunch of fun games from my childhood, I decided to buy it again to play them. It works as well as the one I got when it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Panda

customer_reviews.title: Scam.
customer_reviews.text: The product didn’t come with the controller or the memory card, then when we hooked it up to the TV, nothing. It doesn’t work. Will be sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: They lie about what the package contains.
customer_reviews.text: The product description say that the power cable and AV cords are included, but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Jay S.

product_meta.title: Gamecube Console Platinum
product_meta.description:
Color:Platinum| Edition:ConsoleGet the all-new sleek and stylish Nintendo GameCube Limited Edition Platinum. Nintendo's next-generation console is back and better than ever. This collector's edition console is home to a massive variety of games and a super-powerful 485MHz processor to bring you the ultimate speed, graphics and animation in the gaming world. This console has everything that the original has; only now it's cooler, trendier and classier.

AMAZON.COM
Though it looks like a toy, don't be fooled: the Nintendo GameCube is a powerful video game console that rightly deserves its place among the other next-generation game systems. In fact, its playful, appealing design and small size (the unit is a not-quite-cubed 6 inches) aren't the only features that set it apart from the others.

 For starters, Nintendo has quite clearly made this a game-only machine. It doesn't try to play your CD collection, run your movies, read your e-mail, or store your MP3 files. The company has concentrated its efforts on games. All the prelaunch titles we've seen play smoothly, with bright, fast graphics and great sound. Nintendo says its engineers have removed traditional bottlenecks that have, in the past, slowed down processing. New components designed by IBM and MoSys, as well as a large-capacity secondary memory cache, keep instructions moving through the system's microprocessor (MPU) at peak levels. In English: the GameCube is optimized to push speed up while pushing costs down; hence its position at the lower end of the price spectrum.

 The GameCube is the first Nintendo video game system to use a disc-based medium rather than cartridges for its games. Moving the software to disc media generally means lower development costs for the publishers, which, in turn, trickles down to the consumer not only in price, but also in availability and quality, as it's then easier to try out untested game ideas (Pikmin, anyone?). While most other systems likewise have their games stored on discs, the GameCube's 3-inch format is smaller than everyone else's, and is so designed to fit in a shirt pocket as much as to deter would-be software pirates.

 Of course, the main advantage of the GameCube is that it's the home field of one of the world's premier game designers: Nintendo. While powerhouses Electronic Arts and Sega make games for all systems (including this one), you can play Nintendo games only on a Nintendo system. And Nintendo, you might recall, has been hitting them out of the park since it started with Donkey Kong. In fact, here's a roll call of characters and series you won't find on the other consoles: Mario, Legend of Zelda, Perfect Dark, Metroid, Kirby, and, of course, Pokémon. A few names that the GameCube will share with the other guys: Madden, Tony Hawk, Sonic, Batman, and Star Wars.

 The system also comes with four built-in controller ports, so you can easily plug in extra controllers and let friends join in for the multiplayer games--it's even got a built-in handle so you can easily move it to a friend's house. It comes with two memory card slots for saving your progress through games, and there's the capacity for future expansion into the world of online gaming.

 In short, the GameCube isn't an all-in-one entertainment system, and neither is it the most powerful of the modern video game consoles. But for video game enthusiasts who want to stick with their favorite characters, its value cannot be beat. --Porter B. Hall

 Unit Specifications

 

 * MPU (Microprocessor Unit): 485 MHz custom IBM PowerPC Gekko 
 * Graphics Processor: 162 MHz custom ATI/Nintendo Flipper 
 * Texture-Read Bandwidth: 10.4 GB per second (peak) 
 * Main Memory Bandwidth: 2.6 GB per second (peak) 
 * Pixel Depth: 24-bit color, 24-bit Z buffer 
 * Sound Processor: 81 MHz custom Macronix 16-bit DSP 
 * Sound Performance: 64 simultaneous channels, ADPCM encoding 
 * Polygon Performance: 6 to 12 million polygons per second (peak) 
 * System Memory: 40 MB 
 * Main Memory: 24 MB MoSys 1T-SRAM 
 * Disc Drive: 128 ms CAV (Constant Angular Velocity) system 
 * Data Transfer Speed: 16 Mbps to 25 Mbps 
 * Media: 3-inch, 1.5 GB capacity disc 
 * Controller Ports: Four 
 * Memory Card Slots: Two 
 * Audio-Video Output: Analog and digital 
 * Dimensions: 4.3 by 5.9 by 6.3 inches (height by width by depth)
feature_bullets: Includes Nintendo Platinum GameCube Console, Power Cable, AV Cable, and Nintendo Platinum Controller
Supports instructions for incredible effects -- your games will be brighter, faster, and more dramatic
External bandwidth of 3.2GB/sec, for really fast gameplay
The processor creates 6 to 12 million ploygons per second -- no more slowdowns in the middle of the game
It also includes 64 sound channels -- you'll feel like you're in the game, with the top-quality audio
